targets.query: SELECT last("noise") FROM /^$Station$/ WHERE ("station" =~ /^$Module$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m), "module", "station" fill(null)
SELECT last("temp") FROM /^$Station$/ WHERE ("module" =~ /^$Module$/ AND "station" =~ /^$Station$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m), "module", "station" fill(previous)
SELECT last("value") *-1 FROM "rf_status" WHERE ("station" =~ /^$Station$/ AND "module" =~ /^$Module$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last("value") *-1 FROM "rf_status" WHERE ("station" =~ /^$Station$/ AND "module" =~ /^$Module$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

list.definition: select distinct("station") from (select "value", "station" from temperature where time>now()-10m)
list.name: Station
list.query: select distinct("station") from (select "value", "station" from temperature where time>now()-10m)

list.definition: select distinct("module") from (select "value", "module" from temperature where station='$Station' and time>now()-10m)
list.name: Module
list.query: select distinct("module") from (select "value", "module" from temperature where station='$Station' and time>now()-10m)
